messages.message: Fast refresh only works when a file only exports components. Use a new file to share constants or functions between components.
React Hook useEffect has missing dependencies: 'api' and 'logout'. Either include them or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [api, logout, token]
